title: Ian Wright tearfully remembers childhood teacher
description: The former England star's voice cracks as he pays tribute to "the greatest man in the world".

title: Storm Dennis: Tylorstown landslide after heavy rain
description: "Multiple" landslides have been caused by Storm Dennis, including this one in Tylorstown, Rhondda.

title: Caroline Flack: Laura Whitmore pays tribute to 'vivacious, loving' friend
description: Laura Whitmore also criticised trolls and tabloids, and appealed to listeners to "be kind" to others.

title: Flooding hits as Storm Dennis continues to lash UK
description: Firefighters have rescued people in south Wales and homes have also been flooded in Herefordshire.

title: Coronavirus: China announces drop in new cases for third straight day
description: Foreign minister Wang Yi said the fall showed the outbreak was being managed effectively.

title: Budget may be delayed, says Transport Secretary Grant Shapps
description: Grant Shapps says the new chancellor, Rishi Sunak, needs "a few days to decide on the date".

title: Caroline Flack: Boyfriend Lewis Burton says 'my heart is broken'
description: Lewis Burton pays an emotional tribute to the former Love Island host, a day after she is found dead.

title: England beat New Zealand in Women's T20 World Cup warm-up
description: England cruise to a six-wicket win over New Zealand in their T20 World Cup warm-up game in Adelaide.

title: Six Nations: Scotland add Sam Skinner and Matt Fagerson to squad
description: Sam Skinner and Matt Fagerson are both added to Gregor Townsend's Scotland squad for the remainder of the Six Nations.

title: Australia fires: Thousands in Sydney for Fight Fire Australia concert
description: Australians attend a huge benefit concert in Sydney aiming to raise millions for bushfire relief.

title: All-Star MVP Award to be named after Bryant
description: The NBA All-Star MVP Award is to be permanently renamed after LA Lakers legend Kobe Bryant.

title: Costa Rica makes biggest ever cocaine haul
description: Police found more than five tonnes of the illegal dug hidden in a shipment of flowers, officials say.

title: The Papers: 'Valentine tragedy' and No 10 vows to 'scrap licence fee'
description: The death of former Love Island host Caroline Flack features on many of Sunday's front pages.

title: Coronavirus: Couple quarantined on cruise ship criticise UK government
description: David Abel and his wife, Sally, accuse the UK government of ignoring their pleas for help.

title: Flood defences in England get 1% of infrastructure spending
description: Nearly £5bn is due to be spent on flood defences in England up until 2026, government figures show.

title: Crossing Divides: The hostel promoting tourism to ease Israel's tensions
description: An Arab-Jewish-owned hostel caused controversy but is being held up as a symbol of change.

title: 'Period-shaming' Indian college forces students to strip to underwear
description: Dozens of women were made to remove their knickers to prove they were not menstruating.

title: US election 2020: Could it be Bernie Sanders v Donald Trump?
description: If Bernie Sanders isn't the Democratic front-runner at this point, the word has little meaning.

title: Swiss Crypto AG spying scandal shakes reputation for neutrality
description: The revelation that foreign intelligence used a Swiss company's devices for spying provokes outrage.

title: The monk saving Timbuktu's treasures
description: Why is a Benedictine monk travelling to Mali to save Islamic texts?

title: 'City of Women': A refuge for Colombia's displaced
description: Women displaced by Colombia's armed conflict created their own community to offer each other support.

title: Why the world needs 'Instagrans'
description: A new generation of influencers are making their mark on social media.

title: Young onset Parkinson's disease surgery gives Luton man 'lifeline'
description: The disease, which normally affects people later in life, forced Ryan to make a "scary" decision.
